QA.instruction:
Create an HTML page that tells a story about a cat obsessed with astronomy. You can use images and text to make the story engaging and visually appealing. 
Here is a possible storyline:
Meet Luna, a curious cat with a passion for the stars. She spends every night gazing up at the sky, mesmerized by the twinkling lights. One evening, Luna decides to take her fascination to the next level and sets off on a journey to explore the universe.
She starts by researching constellations on her owner's laptop, scrolling through pages of star charts and diagrams. Luna discovers that her favorite constellation is Orion, the mighty hunter, with its distinctive three-star belt.
Eager to see Orion up close, Luna builds a cardboard telescope using a tutorial she found on YouTube. She spends hours adjusting the lenses and calibrating the focus, determined to get the clearest view possible.
Finally, the moment arrives. Luna peeks through the eyepiece of her makeshift telescope and gasps in wonder. She can see Orion's belt in stunning detail, along with dozens of other stars and galaxies she never knew existed.
From that night on, Luna becomes a regular stargazer, documenting her observations in a hand-drawn journal. She even starts attending astronomy club meetings at the local library, where she shares her newfound knowledge with fellow space enthusiasts.
In the end, Luna discovers that her passion for astronomy has led her on a journey of self-discovery and curiosity. She realizes that there is always more to learn and explore, both in the vast universe and within herself.

sampling_freq, audio = wavfile.read('ocean_sound.wav')

plt.xlabel('Time (s)')
plt.ylabel('Amplitude')
plt.title('Sound Wave of the Ocean')
plt.show()
